bibl.title: The Gods in Later Orphism.
bibl.note: Contribution to the fifth A.G. Leventis Conference held in Edinburgh in November 2007. - Introducing Orphism. - The Main Features of Orphic Gods. - 'New' Gods. - Gods with a Special Prominence. - Conclusion. - Refers to P. Derveni (= M.-P.3 2465.1; LDAB 7049) as well as to P.S.I. XV, 1476 (= M.-P.3 1583.3; LDAB 1056).

bibl.title: The Gods of Ancient Greece. Identities and Transformations

bibl.seg: BERNABÉ Alberto, The Gods in Later Orphism.
Jan N. BREMMER and Andrew ERSKINE (Edd.), The Gods of Ancient Greece. Identities and Transformations = Edinburgh Leventis Studies. 5 (Edinburgh, 2010) pp. 422-441.

Contribution to the fifth A.G. Leventis Conference held in Edinburgh in November 2007. - Introducing Orphism. - The Main Features of Orphic Gods. - 'New' Gods. - Gods with a Special Prominence. - Conclusion. - Refers to P. Derveni (= M.-P.3 2465.1; LDAB 7049) as well as to P.S.I. XV, 1476 (= M.-P.3 1583.3; LDAB 1056).
